## Value.DateTimeValue property

Gets or sets the actual value if it can be represented as DateTime. Default value is MinValue.

```csharp
public DateTime DateTimeValue { get; set; }
```

### Remarks

Prefer this property over the [`Val`](../val), when you need to set the DateTime value.
